forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. High 16C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.
